JustCall

Version 0.1.0

Instant video calls with a single hotkey press.

How to use:

  1. Add a target (person or group) in the Targets tab
  2. Share your pairing code with them
  3. Press your hotkey to instantly join a call
  4. Press the hangup hotkey to end the call
